channel.title: Posts on Boris Rossovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Boris Rossovsky

item.title: Ad: Orbital Ordnance
item.description: Tasked with designing a brand for a mobile app, followed by a long-form image to advertise the app.

item.title: Icons: First Vector Art
item.description: My first venture into vector art and iconography. Tasked by “Harold Bezingle” (my college instructor, Neil van der King) to create two sets of icons for two different demographics.

item.title: NEXT (George Brown College)
item.description: yearendshow.schoolofdesign.ca Tasked with designing and developing a multi-user portfolio website for graduating students to showcase their work. Responsible for the following: Setting up a public Linux web server Setting up a WordPress installation Setting up a front-end publishing system in WordPress Implementing features from design Styling to fit design For this project, I chose WordPress as the starting point.
